import React, { useContext} from 'react' import { GlobalState } from "../../../GlobalState"; // import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; function Cart() { const state = useContext(GlobalState) const [cart] = state.userAPI.cart return (
{ cart.map(product => ( <>

{product.title}

PHP {product.price}

{product.description}

+ -
)) }

Order Summary

Total Purchase : PHP 100.00
Place Order
) } export default Cart
